ClassificationScheme.Note: Update with new terms and definitions

Term.Name: Description
Term.Definition: A human readable description of the content.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Annotation Description
Term.Definition: An annotated description of the content
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Synopsis
Term.Definition: A brief or condensed statement giving a general view e.g. a brief summary of the plot of a novel, motion picture, play, etc. Origin:
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Group Synopsis
Term.Definition: The synopsis of a group of content/resources e.g. the synopsis of a series.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Annotation Synopsis
Term.Definition: An annotated synopsis
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Script / Screenplay / Storyboard
Term.Definition: A motion-picture or television scenario. Text specifying content of a production or performance, used as a guide. May include character and setting profiles, production directives (audio, lighting, scenery, camera moves), as well as dialogue to be recited by talent.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Summary
Term.Definition: A comprehensive and usually brief abstract, recapitulation, or compendium of of actions and events in the content / resource.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Promotional information
Term.Definition: Something devised to publicize or advertise a content / resource or associated product.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Review / Opinion
Term.Definition: a critical article or report concerning the content / resource, e.g. a critique or an evaluation.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Selection / Excerpt
Term.Definition: To take or select passages; abridge by choosing representative sections.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Table of contents
Term.Definition: An sequentually structured and itemised list of items contained in the content / resource in a particular order.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Playlist
Term.Definition: A list of content within a particular program or time period, often including their sequence, duration, etc. for example in an electronic file containing a list of audio or video files that can be played back in a particular sequence. Origin:
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Abstract
Term.Definition: To express a syntetic characteristic.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Transcript
Term.Definition: An exact copy or reproduction e.g. of a dialog or interview.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Anecdotal comments & reflections
Term.Definition: Commenst and reflections based e.g. on personal observation.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Annotation
Term.Definition: A critical or explanatory note or body of notes added to a text.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Bookmarks
Term.Definition: One or more pointer to facilitate quick access to a specific part of the content / resource.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Theme
Term.Definition: A unifying or dominant idea, motif, etc., in the content / resource.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Highlights
Term.Definition: Striking, noticeable aspects of the content / resource.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Shot list
Term.Definition: Freeform textual listing of shots, for example indexed against time or frame count.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Edit Decision List
Term.Definition: (EDL) Handwritten or computer-generated compilation of all edits (marked by their time code in points and out points) to be executed in a video production.
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Purpose
Term.Definition: A summary of the intentions with which the data set was developed.
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Outline
Term.Definition: A general account indicating only the main features of the content of a resource.
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Rundown
Term.Definition: A rundown sheet is a simple review of the script for the with directions for the various crew members. It can also be breaking the show into "blocks" split by commercial breaks and it lists all the different pieces of the show and what should happen during these pieces (e.g. a graphic will display, or a video tape will be played). This is useful for the crew so that they do not have to read through an entire script during production, they have the show in a simplified form. A rundown can be used for playout
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Cue Words
Term.Definition: Signal to begin, end, or otherwise influence on-camera activity while recording. Presetting specific starting points of audio or video material so it's available for immediate and precise playback when required.
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Cue-In Words
Term.Definition: The actual words on the sound track or a textual reference to music etc. at the in-cue point.
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Cue-Out Words
Term.Definition: The words on the sound track or a textual reference to music etc. at the out-cue point
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Process
Term.Definition: A description of the process to which the resource was submitted e.g. during restoration
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Assessment / Qualitative Value
Term.Definition: A subjective evaluation of the (asset, content, aesthetic, historic, technical) value of the resource
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Awards
Term.Definition: A description of the awards attributed to the resource (festival, award name, award classification, nomination category, etc.)
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Editorial comments
Term.Definition: Comments made to complement editorial definitions.
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Key Points
Term.Definition: Highlights, special features, etc.
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Number
Term.Definition: E.g. episode number or position number in a sequence of ordered resources
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Headline
Term.Definition: Title summarising the main descriptive elements concerning a news item
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Shot Description
Term.Definition: A freeform textual description of a shot.
Term.ChangeComment: Refine due to duplication and overlap with Term@termID="17".

Term.Name: Dopesheet
Term.Definition: Technical and editorial information about a news item
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Keyword
Term.Definition: One or more terms characterising / summarising an aspect of the content.
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Credit Line
Term.Definition: Used to attribute special credit for contribution to the resource being described
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Instructions
Term.Definition: Used to provide instructions specific to the use of the resource being described
Term.ChangeComment: New term

Term.Name: Model Information
Term.Definition: Information about the model (e.g. fashion) presented in the content
Term.ChangeComment: New term for harmonisation with IPTC

Term.Name: Artwork / Object
Term.Definition: Information about an object or artwork presented in the content
Term.ChangeComment: New term for harmonisation with IPTC

Term.Name: Event
Term.Definition: Information about the event depicted in the content
Term.ChangeComment: New term for harmonisation with IPTC

Term.Name: Release information
Term.Definition: Information contextually important at the time of publication inc. particular conditions, restrictions on media, medium, publication region, etc.
Term.ChangeComment: Update TV-Anytime

Term.Name: Intention
Term.Definition: A summary of the intentions with which the data set was developed.
Term.ChangeComment: New term for harmonisation with SMPTE RP 210

Term.Name: Shot Comment
Term.Definition: The comment or note about a shot (e.g., 'general view of valley in autumn', 'badly recorded' or 'sombre mood').
Term.ChangeComment: New term for harmonisation with SMPTE RP 210

Term.Name: Quote / Citation
Term.Definition: A citation or quote from a contributor / participant, or a related quote.
Term.ChangeComment: New term for harmonisation with SMPTE RP 210
